bilingual.source: The customer service department handled many customer inquiries.
bilingual.target: 客户服务部门处理了许多客户的查询。

bilingual.source: Effective customer relationship management can improve customer satisfaction.

bilingual.source: Customer relationship management helps us better understand customer needs.
bilingual.target: 客户关系管理帮助我们更好地了解客户需求。

bilingual.source: We need to improve our customer svc to retain clients.
bilingual.target: 我们需要改进客户服务以留住客户。

bilingual.source: The customer service team is replying to customer inquiries quickly.
bilingual.target: 客服团队正在快速回复客户的询问。

bilingual.source: Cmr software is essential for managing customer data.

list.abstract: customer（英 [ˈkʌstəmə]，美 [ˈkʌstəmər]），英语单词，名词，意思为顾客；客户；对象。短语搭配有customer service（客户服务）。例句为“One customer put the bag into a pot.（一位顾客把袋子放进了锅里。）” customer相关近义词有client、apple等。

yingyinNormal.en: Most of it went to UBS. You're very lucky. The largest bank in France froze customer's money market accounts today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大部分给瑞银了，你们很幸运，法国最大的银行今天冻结了客户的货币市场账户。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you look at that! Our first customer in years!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看看！这几年来我的第一位顾客！

yingyinNormal.en: She wants to see the chef. What did the customer say? It was not a customer. It was a critic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她说要见主厨。顾客怎么说？那不是顾客，是评论家。

yingyinNormal.en: As a paying customer, I expect to get what I want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 付钱的是大爷，我爱怎样就怎样。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to pretend I'm a customer, and order a hamburger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来扮演一个要点餐的客人，要点一个汉堡。

yingyinNormal.en: In a moment, please, I'm in the middle of a task. And you have a customer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，我忙得不可开交，你有顾客上门。

yingyinNormal.en: I have one customer. They gave me $200 tip. Wait. what? I was like, "Wow!"
yingyinNormal.zh: 有个客人给了我200块小费！什么？我感觉太爽了！

yingyinNormal.en: I'll take the money. Suzy and you can start the shelves. OK. Danny dog is the first customer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就来负责收钱吧，苏西，你呢，就负责拿东西过来。好的。小狗丹尼是第一个顾客。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll take the money, Suzy, and you can start the shelves. OK. Danny dog is the first customer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就来负责收钱吧，苏西，你呢，就负责拿东西过来。好的。小狗丹尼是第一个顾客。

yingyinNormal.en: What check thing? As a joke, this customer at work who has a crush on me, gave me a $20,000 tip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么支票？有个喜欢我的顾客开玩笑，给我两万元的小费。

yingyinNormal.en: I see you're also a customer. Are you satisfied with our product? She's very realistic. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我了解到你也是我们公司的顾客。对我们的产品满意么？很是逼真。谢谢你们的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: Before the day is over, it will be poured, rolled, cooled, and stacked for delivery to the customer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在一天时间内它会被灌，碾，然后冷却，然后发货给顾客。

yingyinNormal.en: Cause you used to be like the chef, and I was the customer, and now we're like this couple that fights.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以前你是厨师，我是顾客，现在我们是两个争吵的人。

yingyinNormal.en: We're all playing catchup. Our tech guys work until 2:00, 3:00 in the morning. Customer service is slammed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在玩追赶游戏，我们这些技术员要工作到凌晨两三点，客服电话全堵着。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you said that you left Papa John's because of the cups? Is there something I should be aware of as a customer?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，你说你离开了约翰老爹，因为杯子? 作为顾客的我有什么我需要知道的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: If it's bigger than 3 1/2, it won't fit their cutting and cooking equipment, and if it's smaller than that, the customer feels cheated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是直径超过3.5，就放不进油炸机器里，要是太小消费者又会感觉上当受骗。

yingyinNormal.en: A customer service representative with an Indian accent will create the impression we're a vast enterprise that uses overseas call centers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个操着印度口音的客服能够给客人们留下一种我们这是跨国公司使用海外客服中心的印象。

yingyinNormal.en: In addition to all his other crops, he's an expert at producing Blooming Onions, 1,500 tons of them every year, precisely to his customer's specifications.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了他种植的其他作物，他还是一位制作开花洋葱的专家，每年生产1500吨，完全按照消费者需求来生产的洋葱。

yingyinNormal.en: So, that's it. That was my last hope. I'm going to be deported, sent home in disgrace, exposed to the sardonic barb of my cousin Sanjay. Or, as you may know him, Dave from AT&T customer service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，玩完了。那是我最后的希望，我要被驱除出境了，狼狈地回到家里，被我表亲桑杰冷嘲热讽，或许你们知道他的马甲，是AT&T的客服人员戴夫。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: All good targets should have multiple criteria relating to critical factors such as time, money, quality and <highlight>customer</highlight> feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有好的目标都应该有与时间、金钱、质量和顾客反馈等关键因素相关的多重标准。

examination_example.sentence: Energy companies can use AI to help <highlight>customers</highlight> reduce their electricity bills, saving them money while helping the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能源公司可以利用人工智能帮助用户降低电费，在帮助环境的同时为他们省钱。

examination_example.sentence: We're also giving our <highlight>customers</highlight> better channels versus picking up the phone to accomplish something beyond human scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与拿起手机完成超出人力范围的任务相比，我们还为顾客提供了更好的渠道。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: By creating more awareness around your efforts to reduce waste, you can build <highlight>customer</highlight> loyalty based on shared values and responsibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过在减少浪费的努力中提高节约意识，你可以在共同的价值观和责任感的基础上建立客户忠诚度。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Customers</highlight> can bring shoes of any brand into an Adidas store to be shredded and turned into alternative fuels for energy creation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消费者可以把任何品牌的废旧鞋子带到阿迪达斯商店，经过粉碎处理后转化为创造能源的可替代燃料。

examination_example.sentence: They want to make their <highlight>customers</highlight> interested in preserving their products and preventing things that still have value from going to the garbage dump.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些服装类、鞋类、电子产业类的零售商和生产商旨在让他们的消费者注意对产品的保护，防止商品还没真正用完就丢掉，造成浪费。

examination_example.sentence: To motivate visitors to bring in more old shoes, Adidas Brazil promotes the program in stores by showing videos to educate <highlight>customers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了鼓励游客带来更多的旧鞋，阿迪达斯巴西店通过播放视频来宣传该计划。

examination_example.sentence: Office of <highlight>Customer</highlight> Focused Government is examining the possibility of outsourcing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以客户为中心的政府（CFG）办公室正在审查外包的可能性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We have found very few instances of bad <highlight>customer</highlight> behavior at our store in the past year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的一年里，我们很少在商场发现不良顾客行为。

examination_example.sentence: Companies are abandoning conventional functional departments and organizing employees into cross-disciplinary teams that focus on particular products, problems or <highlight>customers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司正在放弃传统的职能部门，将员工组织成关注特定产品、问题或客户的跨学科团队。

examination_example.sentence: Over 10 months, Comcast received nearly 12, 000 <highlight>customer</highlight> complaints, many relating to its monthly data cap and overage (超过额度的) charges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历经10个多月，康卡斯特公司收到了近12000份消费者投诉，很多都与其每月数据限额和超额收费有关。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In the cafe, <highlight>customers</highlight> will enjoy themselves in the historical environment that is created for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在咖啡馆里，顾客会在为他们创造的历史环境中尽情享受。

examination_example.sentence: Larry was traveling along 165 north after delivering to one of his <highlight>customers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉里在给他的一位客户送货后沿着165号公路向北行驶。

examination_example.sentence: It is always crowded with <highlight>customers</highlight> at meal times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每逢用餐时间，那里总是挤满了顾客。
